recipe.title: Roasted Cauliflower with Tahini and Pomegranate

inspiration.text: Roasted Cauliflower with Tahini Sauce and Pomegranate Molasses - Craving Tasty

recipe.ingredients: 1 cauliflower, cut into large florets 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil ½ tsp salt ½ tsp black pepper 1½ tsp paprika
1 garlic clove, pressed 1 tbsp lemon juice (½ lemon) 3 tbsp tahini 1 tbsp water (plus more as req) ½ tsp salt (to taste) ¼ tsp black pepper (to taste)
2 tbsp pomegranate molasses 2 tbsp pomegranate seeds 1 tsp fresh mint leaves, finely chopped 1 tbsp parsley leaves, finely chopped 1 tbsp lemon juice (juice of half a lemon)

method.step: To make roasted cauliflower: Preheat oven to 220oC
In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower florets with the olive oil, paprika, salt and pepper until evenly coated
Transfer cauliflower onto a large baking sheet and spread around in a single layer (avoid crowding as humidity will cause sogginess)
Roast until crispy and golden brown, about 45 minutes, stirring halfway through cooking. Remove cauliflower from the oven and transfer to a serving platter and let cool

To make the tahini sauce: In a small bowl, combine the garlic, tahini and lemon juice. The sauce will thicken at this point so water will need to be added. Start with one tablespoon and mix well until it gets a yoghurt consistency. Add more water to achieve the right consistency. Taste and season with salt and pepper as needed. Set aside.
When the roasted cauliflower has cooled, sprinkle with the tahini sauce, lemon juice, pomegranate molasses, pomegranate seeds, chopped mint and parsley leaves. Serve immediately.
